channel.title: How Would I go about creating this?
channel.description:
I really kinda just want a copy and paste right now. I know where to add it and all but im using a 317 source.
How would i make a command that like if u typed ::Convert It would take 500mil gp. And change it to an Item Please help with this

item.title: How Would I go about creating this?
item.dc:creator: @ZioBotic ZioBotic
item.description:
@ZioBotic wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“convert”)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 500000000);
c.getItems().addItem(ID, Amount);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: How Would I go about creating this?
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

What source? Heres for PI.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“convert”)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 500000000);
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
}

Just wrote this up hope it works.

Read full topic
